snippet: An experimental drug shows promise in harnessing the immune system to fight cancer, but it is not clear whether the drug will actually help people live longer.
abstract: Suzanne L Topalian study in the New England Journal of Medicine finds that an experimental drug developed by Bristol-Myers Squibb is showing promise in making cancerous tumors more vulnerable to the body's natural immune system.
lead_paragraph: An experimental drug shows promise in harnessing the immune system to fight cancer, but it is not clear whether the drug will actually help people live longer.

headline.seo: Drug Helps Immune System Fight Cancer
headline.main: Drug Helps Defense System Fight Cancer
headline.print_headline: Drug Helps Defense System Fight Cancer
